Description: This home is located in a highly desirable area in the Treeland area of Bridgeport.  This single-family home is located at 29 Glenbrook Rd, Bridgeport, CT. 29 Glenbrook Rd is in Bridgeport, CT and in ZIP code 06610. This property has 5 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, Den/ great room and approximately 2,227 sqft of floor space full unfinish basement newer heating system. This property has a lot size of 7,758 sqft and was built in 1944. Home is close public transportation, shopping. This property is short sale subject to lender approval seller has an attorney assisting with the short sale. Please allow 24 hours notice before each showings.  Seller requested all showings to be between 12Noon to 4:00PM.  At seller request no more SUNDAY and Saturday SHOWINGS and NO SHOWING.  Thank you.

Adorable 3 Bedroom/2 Full Bathroom Cape style home in the coveted Treeland area of Bridgeport.  Situated on a corner lot with a side yard, perfect for all of your outdoor activities. Head upstairs to the Master Bedroom Suite complete with a sitting room/den, office nook (or additional closet space) and a full bathroom. Additionally, the house has an attached garage and a double wide driveway for off street parking. Lastly, the basement has been used in the past as an additional flex space (family room/play room) and has chimney access for a wood burning fireplace.
